briefdescription.para: A helper type alias to get a tensor containing doubles.

parameterdescription.para: The indices that can be used along each dimension of the tensor.

briefdescription.para: A helper type alias to get a 1D tensor (a vector).

parameterdescription.para: The type of the elements of the tensor (usually double/complex).
The dimensions that can be used to index the vector.

briefdescription.para: A helper type alias to get a 1D tensor (a vector) of doubles.

parameterdescription.para: The dimensions that can be used to index the vector.

briefdescription.para: An operator to multiply all a tensor by a value.

parameterdescription.para: The value by which the elements should be multiplied.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the multiplication.

detaileddescription.para:
An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate to which the tensor is added.
tensor
The tensor to be added to the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate from which the tensor is subtracted.
tensor
The tensor to be subtracted from the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate to which the tensor is added.
tensor
The tensor to be added to the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate from which the tensor is subtracted.
tensor
The tensor to be subtracted from the coordinate.
The new coordinate.
